co.paralleluniverse.fibers

Class FiberAsync<V,Callback,A,E extends Throwable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.fibers.FiberAsync<V,Callback,A,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The value retuned by the async request
    Callback - The interface of the async callback.
    E - An exception class that could be thrown by the async request
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Fiber.PostParkActions
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FiberAsyncListenableFuture

    public abstract class FiberAsync<V,Callback,A,E extends Throwable>
extends Object
implements Fiber.PostParkActions
    A general helper class that transforms asynchronous requests to synchronous calls on a LightweightThread.

      • run

        public final void run(Fiber current)
        Internal method, do not call. Called by Fiber immediately after park. This method may not use any ThreadLocals as they have been rest by the time the method is called.
